home.title: HOME
home.subtitle: Bringing the finest Iberico products to China

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.content: We are dedicated to bringing you the finest Iberico products, carefully selected and imported directly from Spain. Our passion for quality and tradition drives us to provide you with an exceptional culinary experience.

whereToFindUs.title: Where to find us
whereToFindUs.content: You can find our products on Red Note and WeChat platforms.

onlyTheFinest.title: Only The Finest
onlyTheFinest.content: We select only the highest quality Iberico products from trusted farms in Spain. Each product is carefully inspected to ensure it meets our strict standards.

whyIberico.title: Why Iberico
whyIberico.content: Iberico pork is known worldwide for its exceptional quality, flavor, and marbling. The unique diet of acorns and natural herbs gives Iberico its distinctive taste and nutritional benefits.

about.title: About Us
about.content: We are a team of passionate food enthusiasts dedicated to bringing the authentic taste of Spain to discerning customers. Our journey began with a simple mission: to share the extraordinary flavors of premium Iberico products with the world.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.name: Name
contact.thankyou: Thank you for your message. We will contact you soon.
